title: GHome Smart Dimmer Switch, Single Pole, Neutral Wire Required, 2.4GHz Light Switch WiFi Compatible with Alexa, Google Home, UL Certified,White, 4Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #73,842 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #149 in Dimmer Switches       #149 in Dimmer Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: 0% - 100% Dimming - The tuya dimmer switch adjusts the desired brightness/speed via phone smart life app, voice control, or manually via the LED touch panel. The brightness memory function is available for the last light setting when powered off. Supports up to 150W dimmable LED/UL or 400W incandescent bulbs and 100W ceiling fans. Note that smart dimmer switch cannot be used with smart bulb.

Voice & Remote Control-The tuya smart switch dimmer works with Alexa and Google Assistant, you can stay in bed or sit on the sofa to turn on/off lights. It comes in handy when your hands are full. No distance limitations, you can control and check your home lights via smartphone smart app. Turn on/off the lights in the office. Never worry about forgetting to turn off the lights when you go out.

Time Schedules - Set schedules to turn on/off electrical appliances while you are home or away. With the dimmer smart switch , you can create your personalized smart scenes to adjust your home lighting automatically to sunset and sunrise times.

Group & Scene Control - This tuya smart light switches Create the lighting group you want, control them from any room and expand it any time;Meanwhile, you all can create various scenes for get up, sleep and so on.rol them from any room and expand it any time;Meanwhile, you all can create various scenes for get up, sleep and so on.

Note- UL Certified;Neutral Wire is needed; Step-by-step instructions will guide you through the wiring process.Standard size fits any standard multi-gang wall plate.single-pole use only (NOT 3-way);"2.4G” WiFi only for the first time installation (NOT 5G)

customers_say: Customers find the smart dimmer switch easy to install, particularly with Alexa integration, and appreciate its appearance and value for money. The dimming ability receives mixed feedback - while customers like the dimming option, they report the lights don't dim low enough. Moreover, the functionality and quality show mixed results, with some units working flawlessly while others malfunction after a while and show poor reliability. Additionally, the WiFi functionality is also mixed, with some customers reporting it works with Alexa while others say it won't pair with Wi-Fi.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Excellent product! I have several Gosund smart  devices and find them to be the most reliable when compared to other brands. I moved into a new home and wanted a dimmer on some recessed lights but also wanted to use it with my Alexa system. The design of the switch with the screw terminals is a space-saving design but having to install the tiny screws that are included is a little inconvenient. I am an electrician by trade so this isn’t a big deal. Setup to Alexa and Gosund app is a simple and fast. Dimming control using Alexa is so convenient, too. I had purchased a Leviton model from HD but took it back because it required another accessory device to work as a 3-way. That is not the case with this model and it works perfectly when installed as the switch with the power feeding the circuit as shown in the device instructions.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery good asset for my smart home.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Alexa says good things about this switch for an Amazon review: "I'm not quite sure about it."  So far, so good. I had a rough time installing it in a two and 3-gang box, which is more related to the narrow space switch, wires, connectors, etc. The installation is straightforward; they include all you need for installation, including the wire caps and wall plate. The connection with the GoSund app and Alex was almost instantaneous. I dismissed all wall plates once I kept mine - American standard. The dimmer function is fantastic and works very well. Fancy, too - in the middle of the knob.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Excellent switches. I setup via the Gosund App then connected with Alexa. Work fantastic. Ordered 3x now. No issues since 2021 in 3 different houses!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Switch was easy wiring diagram. The list of problems goes on: 1) it will ask you to download gosund and register an account that is a hassle. They ask my email(I use hotmail) and would send me a verification code. The code never arrived in my mailbox and wasn't able to register an account. So I just bought a paper weight garbage. I opened a gmail email and I received the so called code and was able to pair my phone gosund app with the smart switch. It works ok if manually operated. Problem 2) It didn't work with 5ghz wifi network but somehow it successfully connected with my wifi but alexa will only have control if you say a full sentence like this "alexa turn on smart switch" or "alexa dim smart switch to ..%percent". Just not so good product. I will trash this one and go back to the meross smart switches that I had in my other house. I only had to say dim the lights or turn off lights and it worked flawlessly.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: While it worked it was nice. After just a couple months the wifi feature would not work. After 2 years switch stayed on full and would not dim or shut off.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMajor quality improvements from previous versions.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: We had one of the switches on previous versions of this product fail. I was hesitant to purchase again because the previous iteration had some quality issues, but we didn't want to replace all of our switches just because one went out, so I purchased again.  However, I was very pleasantly surprised upon receiving the item that the packaging was new, the product looked similar but the quality was much better, the screw holes were standard size (a big problem with a previous version), and all in all I was very happy with the updates. It seemed to be primarily a quality improvement, rather than a complete redesign which meant it fits perfectly with our previously purchased switches (gosund) and it isn't immediately obvious aesthetically that one switch is a different version. Very happy to see a company actually listen to consumer complaints and make quality adjustments.
